CardData.Name: Not_So_Fast
CardData.Description: Attack all enemies for 40 dmg and apply Lethargy with a 75% chance for 2 turns.

CardData.Name: We_Can_Do_It
CardData.Description: Remove one debuff from all enemies. Apply healing buff for 5% of your Max HP for 3 turns

CardData.Name: Hold_Strong
CardData.Description: Heal the target ally for 50 HP. Draw 1 card.

CardData.Name: Icy_Touch
CardData.Description: Attack enemy for 40 dmg. 40% chance to inflict Frostbite for 1 turn.
